channel.title: Pork Chops on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Pork Chops on Cooking

item.title: Pork Chops
item.description: Cooking pork chops and finished in bacon grease in cast iron Used the Joule to cook fresh bone-on pork chops at at 140 degrees for 1 hour. While that was cooking I cooked 8 strips of bacon in a cast iron skillet. After the pork chops were done I seared the pork chops in the left over bacon grease. Why not?
